attributes.action: Enforce greater punishment on those who choose to and are caught bullying.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think bullys get away with too much.  Bullys should be faced with a strict punishment to deter them from bullying and more help.  I know this is a difficult subject as people will argue that they may have difficulties that make them bully.  This is not really an excuse for making another persons life unbearable.  Help should also be provided.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=bullying
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
